metadata.Title: CVE-2018-3847 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Multiple exploitable buffer overflow vulnerabilities exist in image parsing functionality of the CFITSIO library version 3.42. Specially crafted images parsed via the library, can cause a stack-based buffer overflow overwriting arbitrary data. An attacker can deliver an FIT image to trigger this vulnerability and potentially gain code execution.

criterions.comment: cfitsio package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
